weapons.name: Eternal Sword
weapons.description: Hand Weapon Enchantment. The wielder gains +1 Attack Value, +1 Offensive Skill, and +1 Defensive Skill. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

weapons.name: Mortal Blade
weapons.description: Hand Weapon Enchantment. Attacks made with this weapon gain Lethal Strike and Multiple Wounds (2, against Gigantic).

weapons.name: Lash of Lust
weapons.description: Hand Weapon enchantment. May be used to make the following Shooting Attack: Range 12", Shots 2D6, Str as user, AP as user, Quick to Fire. This may not be used if the wielder performed a March Move.  The Aim is 3+. If the wielder is Gigantic, the Aim is 2+ instead.

weapons.name: Heart Seeker
weapons.description: Hand Weapon Enchantment. Natural to-hit rolls of ‘1’ from attacks made with this weapon must be rerolled

weapons.name: Dissolving Touch
weapons.description: Hand Weapon Enchantment. At Initiative Step 10, each enemy model in base contact with the wielder suffers 1 hit with Toxic Attacks.

weapons.name: Aether Wand
weapons.description: Hand Weapon Enchantment. Whenever the wielder successfully casts a non-attribute Spell, or successfully dispels a Spell, roll a D6. On a 4+, the wielder gains a charge counter. Roll a D6. On aFor each charge counter the wielder gains +1 Attack Value when using this weapon.

weapons.name: Blade of Grief
weapons.description: Hand Weapon Enchantment. The wielder gains Fear. Attacks made with this weapon gain Divine Attacks.

weapons.name: Trident of Torment
weapons.description: Hand Weapon Enchantment. The wielder gains +1 Offensive Skill, +1 Defensive Skill, and +1 Agility when using this weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Armour Penetration.

Artefacts.name: Nauseating Aura
Artefacts.description: Talisman. Enemy units in base contact with the bearer never have more than Agility 1 during the Melee Phase.

Artefacts.name: Shackles of Reality
Artefacts.description: Talisman. The Bearer gains Fortitude (4+)

Artefacts.name: Veil of Shadows
Artefacts.description: Talisman. The bearer’s unit gains Hard Target and Magic Resistance (1).

Artefacts.name: Iron Hide
Artefacts.description: Talisman. The bearer Armour is set to 2.

Artefacts.name: Brass Collar
Artefacts.description: Talisman. The Bearer gains Magic Resistance (3)

Artefacts.name: Blissful Bindings
Artefacts.description: Talisman. Close Combat Attacks allocated towards the bearer have their Offensive Skill halved, rounding fractions up.

Artefacts.name: Weaver's Eye
Artefacts.description: Talisman. One Use Only. May be activated when the bearer fails an Aegis Save. This failed Aegis Save may be rerolled.

Artefacts.name: Hellish Crown
Artefacts.description: Enchanted Item. The Bearer gains +1 Discipline.

Artefacts.name: Horn of Damnation
Artefacts.description: Enchanted Item. Enemy units in base contact with the bearer cannot benefit from Rally Around the Flag.

Artefacts.name: Obsidian Horn
Artefacts.description: Enchanted Item. One use only. May be activated at the start of the enemy Magic Phase. When activated, pick an enemy model and choose one of its spells (including Attribute and Bound Spells). The chosen model cannot cast the chosen spell during this Magic Phase.

Artefacts.name: Token of Change
Artefacts.description: Enchanted Item. The bearer can cast Fate’s Judgement from Divination as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

Artefacts.name: Token of Lust
Artefacts.description: Enchanted Item. The bearer can cast Spectral Blades from Evocation as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

Artefacts.name: Token of Pestilence
Artefacts.description: Enchanted Item. The bearer can cast Ancestral Aid from Evocation as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

Artefacts.name: Portal Gem
Artefacts.description: Enchanted Item. All friendly units within 12" of the bearer lose 1 Health Point less from failed Unstable rolls.

Artefacts.name: Black Orb
Artefacts.description: Enchanted Item. Enemy Wizards suffer a -2 modifier to their casting rolls when casting spells from Divination.

Artefacts.name: Blazing Wings
Artefacts.description: Enchanted Item. The bearer gains Fly (8”, 16”).

Artefacts.name: Elixir of Souls
Artefacts.description: Enchanted Item. One use only. May be activated at the start of the Movement Phase. The bearer gains +2 Advance Rate and +4 March Rate during this Phase.

Artefacts.name: Sorceror's Lodestone
Artefacts.description: Arcane Item. One Use Only. May be activated after making a Dispel Attempt or after bearer made a Casting Attempt. Add +D6 modifier to the casting or dispel roll. This is an exception to the Magic Modifiers rule.

Artefacts.name: Soul-Bound Staff
Artefacts.description: Arcane Item. The bearer’s Miscasts suffer a -1 Miscast Modifier.

Artefacts.name: Mirror of Change
Artefacts.description: Arcane Item. At the start of each friendly Magic Phase, the bearer may pick an enemy Wizard within 18” and Line of Sight of it. For the duration of this Magic Phase, the bearer may cast non-Bound Spells known by the selected Wizard, but may not cast any of its own. Spells that Summon new units or Raise models cannot be cast.

Artefacts.name: Scrolls of the Eigth Pact
Artefacts.description: Arcane Item. The bearer gains Protean Magic.
